author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Fix up some blame issues and ensure that our returned errors can go
Passes blame test #1 (annotate a file whose name contains a space), #2
(annotate a binary file), and #3 (annotating a directory not allowed).
(cdata_blame): Acquire property value for set-prop tags.
(start_xml, end_xml, cdata_xml): Do not call XML callbacks when in error.
